definition: a game in which players hit a wooden ball through a series of hoops, to play a game in which players hit a wooden ball through a series of hoops
details:
noun
- a game in which players hit a wooden ball through a series of hoops
verb
- to play a game in which players hit a wooden ball through a series of hoops
= example: to play a game in which players hit a wooden ball through a series of hoops
- to drive away by hitting with one's ball
= example: to drive away by hitting with one's ball
